name: ProgFrog
description:
A puzzle game made in three days during project universe gamejam 2#.

Credits:

Sound design:

https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100009484005333

https://meilavi95.wixsite.com/meitar

Use the given cubes in each level to reach the target

combine two cubes or more by dragging them onto each other 

right click combined cubes to unpack them
